title: Elite Spy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Bug a player each night, learning all night feedback they receive from other than from their own role.
- (6+ Bugs, No Multitask) Choose a player to check, revealing to you their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Other Spy-related roles cannot spawn. (roles similar to Post 62)
- Bugs stay on a player until they die.
- You unlocks other features depending on how many living players have bugs.
- These features are based on the amount of players bugged before that night.
- You are told which player these features relate to.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value:
- (1+ Bugs) You learn any Non-Town roles that visit a bugged player.
- (2+ Bugs) You learn which players each evil faction targetted each night and how many times.
- (3+ Bugs) You learn if the bugged player visited a player of a different faction that night.
- (4+ Bugs) You learn the visitors of a bugged player.
- (5+ Bugs) Bugged players have Basic Defense as long as you're alive and this feature's condition is met.
- (6+ Bugs) You are given Basic Defense and unlock your second ability.
- (7+ Bugs) Your second ability now reveals your target's role to town. This feature and all previous are permanent until death.

desc:
Post 4589
*Town will never need another spy again.*
